title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Simulation Training on Informal Learning Experiences of Korean SME Employees

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve daily workplace problems of Korean SME employees using informal learning strategies in virtual simulations.

Over four weeks, learners complete 3 relationship-centered learning (chemyon) scenarios in VR environments, solving practical application tasks (e.g., conflict resolution, team collaboration) with ≥80% accuracy per scenario. They submit reports meeting ≥4 of 5 checklist items
Learners can analyze the impact of SME organizational culture (family-like atmosphere, multitasking) on learning through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
